name: Interrogation, Greater
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game: Ultimate Magic. © 2011, Paizo Publishing, LLC
text: This spell functions as interrogation, except you may ask one question per caster level and the spell deals damage equal to 1d8 points plus your Wisdom bonus if the target doesn't answer a question.
text_zh: 该法术的功能如同拷问 (Interrogation) 一般，不过你可以询问每施法者等级1个问题，如果目标不回答问题，法术会造成1d8 + 你的感知加值点伤害。
